attributes.review: Because I’m just so great at being 12 years old I downloaded this app to see if I could take a glimpse into the mind of conservatives.  Since downloading this app I have seen more fake news on it then on cnn. If you doubt the social power of gen z think again. This app will soon be removed from the App Store because of a bunch of kids. I’m truly surprised to say that this app was terrible! I can’t even vote yet and I can see through all the madness and twisted lies coming from this campaign.
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review:

C . They are 14 year old girls who have no life and believe everything they see on the internet.

TRUMP 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🚂🚂
attributes.title: This App Is Being Rated Low By Liberals

attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: wish I could had put 0 stars.✨ app is literally a waste of time along with the creator. took DAYS to download, then when it did, took like a couple more days to sign up. it asked very unusual questions like what my race and the color of my panties. very strange i moved on to the next question which asked my race and only have white or other opinions. including my social I put everything in as asked and come to find out my phone was hacked I was very disturbed I felt like they were watching. would NOT recommend my phone has been glitching ever since would NOT recommend, JUST A WASTE OF TIME I feel sick even writing a review due to the app.  blm!!!
attributes.title: waste of time.❤️✨
The worse app in my the world

attributes.review: ˢʰᵃʷᵗʸ'ˢ ˡⁱᵏᵉ ᵃ ᵐᵉˡᵒᵈʸ ⁱⁿ ᵐʸ ʰᵉᵃᵈ ᵗʰᵃᵗ ⁱ ᶜᵃⁿ'ᵗ ᵏᵉᵉᵖ ᵒᵘᵗ ᵍᵒᵗ ᵐᵉ ˢⁱⁿᵍⁱⁿ' ˡⁱᵏᵉ ⁿᵃ ⁿᵃ ⁿᵃ ⁿᵃ ᵉᵛᵉʳʸᵈᵃʸ ᵍᵒᵗ ᵐʸ ⁱᵖᵒᵈ ˢᵗᵘᶜᵏ ᵒⁿ ʳᵉᵖˡᵃʸ, ʳᵉᵖˡᵃʸ⁻ᵃʸ⁻ᵃʸ⁻ᵃʸ
attributes.title: TERRIBLE app!

attributes.review: So I was casually going about my day, when all of a sudden this app popped up on MY recommendations. I was like “ugh, why is the orange famous?” So I decided I wanna download the app to see what would happen. Right? WELL I SHOULDN'T HAVE!! The second I downloaded the  app a rotten orange popped up on my screen. I thought it was some joke, but THEN he asked me for my number! This is extremely rude as he has a wife and kids. So I tried to get rid of the app but I couldn’t! All the oranges in my house started controlling me!!! I got so angry, so I just went to sleep. But there was no getting away for this guy, because in MY DREAM let me repeat MY DREAM, KAREN AND THE ORANGE WERE THERE!! So then I said “I think not you trick little orange!” And I uppercut him. Then Karen said “LeT mE sPeAk tO yOuR mAnAgEr” so I said How about you let me speak to your manager? And put my finger right in her face. She was SHOOKETH. I said Serves you right you ugly orange Karen. Then I woke up only to find myself spray tanned orange with the words oranges 2020!! I was so mad so I washed it off and went to find this orange. I found him at the White House chuckling to himself. “Hey!” I shouted and he was so shocked that I didn’t give up. He tried to run away but I caught him. I used my magical powers and said ABRACADABRA ALAKAZOO but nothing happened. I do not recommend getting this app because he is crazy. Thank you 😌
attributes.title: Orange man, I think NOT!

attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app that is would give the full essence of what it means to be an American. But all I got was a weird orange clown staring at me when I opened it. Have to say guys if this was supposed to be a indi jump scare game.. yikes needs some work. I mean the only thing that was scary of the character was his straw yellowed hair and deep orange skin. Frankly I found the tiny hands adorable though. But because of how lame the game play was I have to give it a low score.
attributes.title: Meh
